username.desc: The SPLUNK Username associated with the Splunk token

token.desc: The Authorization Token, retrieved from Splunk,required that authorizes and directs the content to a particular index

post_endpoint.desc: The specification of the SPLUNK API function to which the retrieved data will be subjected to.

host.desc: The Splunk Server qualified name that is accessible over the internet.

port.desc: The SPLUNK port designated to accept REST API calls.

sourcetype.desc: Type of information being sent to Splunk.

interval.desc: The interval of time in which logs are sent to Splunk sever; specified in minutes.

batch_size.desc: The number of logs sent to Splunk at one time.
